item.title: FBI seeks interviews with Democrats whom Trump called ‘traitors’
item.description: The Trump administration has aggressively sought to punish lawmakers who encouraged service members to disobey unlawful orders.

item.title: What comes next in the James Comey and Letitia James cases?
item.description: A judge’s ruling throwing out the cases against James Comey and Letitia James left several unanswered questions. Most significantly: What happens next...

item.title: Michelle Obama on East Wing demolition: ‘I felt a loss for us as a nation’
item.description: The former first lady said her feelings stemmed from the country and its shared traditions, not a personal attachment to the building Trump knocked do...

item.title: Sen. Jim Justice, wife to pay $5 million in back taxes to settle IRS suit

item.title: As judges face more threats, only the Supreme Court gets new security funds
item.description: There was a spike in threats against the judiciary in the early months of 2025, Marshals Service data shows.
